Tools & Technologies: Java, MongoDB, weka.

Event Recommendation aims to predict what events our users will be interested in based on the user actions, event metadata and demographic information. The insights discovered form the past history of the users forms the basis of a variety of web applications and a key element in improving the user experience.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Watermarking Scheme for Tamper Detection and Recovery of Images
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Tools & Technologies: Matlab.

A tamper recovery scheme for images capable of recovering the original image (or visually similar) till 80 -90% tampering.

Project aimed at developing a search engine for Wikipedia corpus of 40GB with response time less than a second. Retrieval results included relevant documents from corpus for the query supplied by the user.
